11#ifndef API_NUMERICS_SAMPLES_STATS_COUNTER_H_
12#define API_NUMERICS_SAMPLES_STATS_COUNTER_H_
13
14#include <vector>
15
16#include "api/array_view.h"
17#include "api/units/timestamp.h"
18#include "rtc_base/checks.h"
19#include "rtc_base/numerics/running_statistics.h"
20
21namespace webrtc {
22
23// This class extends RunningStatistics by providing GetPercentile() method,
24// while slightly adapting the interface.
25class SamplesStatsCounter {
26 public:
27 struct StatsSample {
28 double value;
29 Timestamp time;
30 };
31
32 SamplesStatsCounter();
33 ~SamplesStatsCounter();
34 SamplesStatsCounter(const SamplesStatsCounter&);
35 SamplesStatsCounter& operator=(const SamplesStatsCounter&);
36 SamplesStatsCounter(SamplesStatsCounter&&);
37 SamplesStatsCounter& operator=(SamplesStatsCounter&&);
38
39 // Adds sample to the stats in amortized O(1) time.
40 void AddSample(double value);
41 void AddSample(StatsSample sample);
42
43 // Adds samples from another counter.
44 void AddSamples(const SamplesStatsCounter& other);
45
46 // Returns if there are any values in O(1) time.
47 bool IsEmpty() const { return samples_.empty(); }
48 // Returns the amount of samples added into counter in O(1) time.
49 int64_t NumSamples() const { return stats_.Size(); }
50
51 // Returns min in O(1) time. This function may not be called if there are no
52 // samples.
53 double GetMin() const {
54 RTC_DCHECK(!IsEmpty());
55 return *stats_.GetMin();
56 }
57 // Returns max in O(1) time. This function may not be called if there are no
58 // samples.
59 double GetMax() const {
60 RTC_DCHECK(!IsEmpty());
61 return *stats_.GetMax();
62 }
63 // Returns average in O(1) time. This function may not be called if there are
64 // no samples.
65 double GetAverage() const {
66 RTC_DCHECK(!IsEmpty());
67 return *stats_.GetMean();
68 }
69 // Returns variance in O(1) time. This function may not be called if there are
70 // no samples.
71 double GetVariance() const {
72 RTC_DCHECK(!IsEmpty());
73 return *stats_.GetVariance();
74 }
75 // Returns standard deviation in O(1) time. This function may not be called if
76 // there are no samples.
77 double GetStandardDeviation() const {
78 RTC_DCHECK(!IsEmpty());
79 return *stats_.GetStandardDeviation();
80 }
81 // Returns percentile in O(nlogn) on first call and in O(1) after, if no
82 // additions were done. This function may not be called if there are no
83 // samples.
84 //
85 // |percentile| has to be in [0; 1]. 0 percentile is the min in the array and
86 // 1 percentile is the max in the array.
87 double GetPercentile(double percentile);
88 // Returns array view with all samples added into counter. There are no
89 // guarantees of order, so samples can be in different order comparing to in
90 // which they were added into counter. Also return value will be invalidate
91 // after call to any non const method.
92 rtc::ArrayView<const StatsSample> GetTimedSamples() const { return samples_; }
93 std::vector<double> GetSamples() const {
94 std::vector<double> out;
95 out.reserve(samples_.size());
96 for (const auto& sample : samples_) {
97 out.push_back(sample.value);
98 }
99 return out;
100 }
101
102 private:
103 webrtc_impl::RunningStatistics<double> stats_;
104 std::vector<StatsSample> samples_;
105 bool sorted_ = false;
106};
107
108// Multiply all sample values on |value| and return new SamplesStatsCounter
109// with resulted samples. Doesn't change origin SamplesStatsCounter.
110SamplesStatsCounter operator*(const SamplesStatsCounter& counter, double value);
111inline SamplesStatsCounter operator*(double value,
112 const SamplesStatsCounter& counter) {
113 return counter * value;
114}
115// Divide all sample values on |value| and return new SamplesStatsCounter with
116// resulted samples. Doesn't change origin SamplesStatsCounter.
117SamplesStatsCounter operator/(const SamplesStatsCounter& counter, double value);
118
119} // namespace webrtc
120
121#endif // API_NUMERICS_SAMPLES_STATS_COUNTER_H_
122
